Adult male.description: Adult male Black-chinned Hummingbirds look similar to adult male Ruby-throated Hummingbirds, especially in poor light, but Black-chinned Hummingbirds have a purple throat and Ruby-throateds have a red throat.

Female/immature.description: Where their ranges overlap, look carefully at the tail on perched birds. Black-chinned Hummingbirds have longer wings that reach the tip of the tail or go slightly beyond it, whereas Ruby-throated Hummingbirds have a longer tail, extending well beyond the wingtips.

Adult male.description: The breeding range of Broad-tailed Hummingbirds does not overlap with Ruby-throated Hummingbirds. Adult male Broad-tailed Hummingbirds lack the adult male Ruby-throated Hummingbird's dark eye patch.

Female/immature.description: Broad-tailed Hummingbirds have cinnamon-colored tail feathers, whereas the tail feathers on Ruby-throated Hummingbirds are green and black. Note range differences.

Adult male.description: The ranges of Anna's and Ruby-throated Hummingbirds do not overlap, but note glittering red forehead on adult male Anna's but not on adult male Ruby-throated Hummingbirds.

Female.description: The ranges of Anna's and Ruby-throated Hummingbirds do not overlap, but note greener washed sides on female Anna's.

Female/immature.description: The breeding ranges of Rufous and Ruby-throated Hummingbirds do not overlap, but note cinnamon washed flanks on female/immature Rufous Hummingbirds.
